abstract: A hierarchical compositional network, representable in Bayesian network form, includes first, second, third, fourth, and fifth parent feature nodes; first, second, and third pool nodes; first, second, and third weight nodes; and first, second, third, fourth, and fifth child feature nodes.
summary: <SOH> BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE FIGURES <EOH>FIGS. 1A and 1B are schematic representations of a convolutional neural network; FIG. 2 is a schematic representation of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 3 is a Bayesian network representation of a subnetwork of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 4A is a factor graph representation of a section of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 4B is a factor graph representation of a section of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 4C is a factor graph representation of a section of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 5A is a factor graph representation of an AND factor node of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 5B is a factor graph representation of an OR factor node of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 5C is a factor graph representation of a POOL factor node of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 6 is a factor graph representation of a subnetwork of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 7 is a factor graph representation of a subnetwork of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 8 is a factor graph representation of a CONV factor node of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 9A is a factor graph representation of connections of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 9B is a functional equivalent representation of connections of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 10 is a factor graph representation of a section of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. 11 is a factor graph representation of a section of a hierarchical compositional network of an invention embodiment; FIG. ...
title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR DEEP LEARNING WITH SMALL TRAINING SETS
